data.text: Akka tulluuwwan fuula kee duratti raafamaniif,
Akkuma ibiddi hanxaxii gubee, bishaan danfisu sana,
Ati yeroo waan sodaachisaa nu hin yaadin hojjettetti gad buute;
Si malee Waaqa warra isa abdataniif dhaabatu,
Ati warra gammachuudhaan waan tolaa hojjetan
Hundi keenya akka nama qulqullina hin qabnee taaneerra;
Namni maqaa kee waammatu tokko iyyuu hin jiru;
Taʼus yaa Waaqayyo, ati Abbaa keenya.
Yaa Waaqayyo, ati akka malee hin dheekkamin;
Manni qulqullummaa keenya qulqullichii fi ulfina qabeessi,
Yaa Waaqayyo, ati wantoota kanneen hunda  calʼuma jettee ilaaltaa?
